## ğŸ¯ REQUIREMENT FULFILLMENT

### Pembayaran System âœ…

- [x] **Ambil data barang dari keranjang**
  - Implementation: `PaymentMenu.showPaymentMenu()` membaca `ArrayList<CartItem>`
  - Verified: Works in scenario testing

- [x] **Menghitung biaya + pajak**
  - Implementation: `Transaction.java` dengan perhitungan pajak 10%
  - Formula: `total = subtotal + (subtotal * pajak / 100)`
  - Verified: Correct calculation in test cases

- [x] **Menerima konfirmasi pembayaran**
  - Implementation: Manual y/n prompt di `PaymentMenu.prosesCheckout()`
  - Verified: Works with user input validation

- [x] **Cetak struk**
  - Implementation: `Receipt.cetakStruk()` - cetak ke console
  - Implementation: `Receipt.simpanKeFile()` - simpan ke file .txt
  - Verified: Both methods working correctly

- [x] **Update stok barang di gudang**
  - Implementation: `PaymentMenu.updateStokGudang()` method
  - Method: Menggunakan `gudang.updateStok()` untuk setiap item
  - Verified: Stok berkurang setelah pembayaran sukses

### Menu Utama âœ…

- [x] **Menu yang bisa akses semua menu**
  - Implementation: `Login/MainMenu.java` sebagai entry point
  - Features: Login, Registrasi, Route ke 3 menu berbeda
  - Verified: All routes working correctly

### Sistem Login âœ…

- [x] **Admin dengan akun default**
  - Username: `admin`
  - No. Telepon: `0812345678`
  - Created in: `LoginSystem.java`
  - Verified: Login successful with default credentials

- [x] **Admin bisa tambah admin baru**
  - Method: `LoginSystem.tambahAdmin()`
  - Implementation in: `AdminMenu.tambahAdminBaru()`
  - Verified: New admin can be created and login

- [x] **Admin bisa tambah kasir baru**
  - Method: `LoginSystem.tambahKasir()`
  - Implementation in: `AdminMenu.tambahKasirBaru()`
  - Verified: New cashier can be created and login

- [x] **Kasir hanya dari admin**
  - Restriction: `if (userLoginSekarang == null || !userLoginSekarang.getRole().equals("admin"))`
  - Verified: Only admin can create cashier

- [x] **Pengguna bisa registrasi mandiri**
  - Method: `LoginSystem.register()`
  - Implementation in: `MainMenu.registrasi()`
  - Verified: User registration working, auto-login after registration

- [x] **3 Role dengan menu berbeda**
  - Admin Menu: `AdminMenu.java` âœ…
  - Cashier Menu: `CashierMenu.java` âœ…
  - User Menu: `UserMenu.java` âœ…
  - Routing: `MainMenu.routeToMenu()` âœ…
  - Verified: Each role has correct menu access

### Edit Minimal pada Kode Lama âœ…

- [x] **Gudang.java - hanya 4 baris berubah**
  - Added: 1 import statement
  - Added: 1 public method (getSemuaBarang)
  - No modification to existing methods
  - 100% backward compatible
  - Verified: All existing methods still work

## ğŸ§ª TEST VERIFICATION

### Unit Testing âœ…

#### Login System
- [x] Admin login dengan default credentials
- [x] Invalid login rejected
- [x] User registration successful
- [x] Username uniqueness enforced
- [x] Admin dapat create user baru

#### Payment System
- [x] Transaksi creation successful
- [x] Pajak calculation correct (10%)
- [x] Total calculation: subtotal + pajak âœ…
- [x] Struk generated correctly
- [x] Struk saved to file âœ…
- [x] Stok updated after payment âœ…

#### Integration Testing âœ…

#### Scenario 1: Admin Login & Manage Data
- [x] Admin login successful
- [x] Admin dapat lihat semua barang
- [x] Admin dapat tambah barang
- [x] Admin dapat edit barang
- [x] Admin dapat hapus barang
- [x] Admin dapat update stok

#### Scenario 2: Admin Create Kasir & Login
- [x] Admin create kasir successful
- [x] Kasir login dengan new credentials
- [x] Kasir access correct menu
- [x] Kasir cannot create user baru

#### Scenario 3: Kasir Process Pembayaran
- [x] Kasir search barang
- [x] Kasir add to cart
- [x] Kasir view cart dengan subtotal
- [x] Kasir checkout
- [x] Kasir select payment method (tunai)
- [x] Kasir confirm payment
- [x] Struk generated & saved
- [x] Stok updated correctly

#### Scenario 4: User Registration & Shopping
- [x] User registrasi mandiri
- [x] User auto-login
- [x] User browse produk
- [x] User search barang
- [x] User add to cart
- [x] User view keranjang
- [x] User checkout & pay
- [x] Struk generated

#### Scenario 5: File Persistence
- [x] users.txt created & updated
- [x] database.txt read correctly
- [x] struk_*.txt created setelah transaksi
- [x] Data persisted across sessions
